text: The Freshwater Biological Association, often shortened to the FBA, is a British charity started in 1929. It aims are to promote freshwater biology. It publishes identification keys to freshwater plants and animals throughout the world, and also maintains a library of freshwater science. Membership is open to anyone who is interested in freshwater science. The Association's main offices are in Far Sawrey, on the banks of Windermere in Cumbria. == Other websites == *The FBA web-site *FBA web-cam at Far Sawrey ferry landing stage Category:Biology Category:Scientific organisations based in the United Kingdom
title: Freshwater Biological Association
